data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Chao, Zhang, Feng (2012): On the subfamilial assignment of Platybunoides (Opiliones: Eupnoi: Phalangiidae), with the description of a new species from China. Zootaxa 3190: 47-55, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.280053
